headline: Another Dairy Giant, Borden, Seeks Bankruptcy Protection
abstract: The Dallas company, which employs 3,300, had been trying to renegotiate its debt agreements for months, but talks fell through.
lead_paragraph: Borden, the dairy producer founded a century and a half ago, has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the latest victim of an industry battered by declining prices, rising costs and changing tastes.
